0.text: welcome to a cave its a cave. This is an example senario

1.text: In the left you meet a wizard. He tells you a long story but you tune it out.

3.text: the wizard looks at you shocked! You will go and retrive the fabelled amulet of Aernsbeard?! Hidden deap in the depths of the cave? Thank you good quester. He bows his head in respect.
